subject: WORK TAX FREE!!! WORK FROM HOME!!!
body:
Dear Sir/Ma,
 
Are you interested in working as our payment processor? Working Part Time from Home?
Get back ASAP with your details.
Thanks,Management,TK  TEXTILES.
